text: Table tennis was contested at the 2015 Summer Universiade from July 6 to 13 at the Jangseong Hong Gil-Dong Gymnasium in Jangseong, South Korea. Men's and women's singles, men's and women's team, and men's, women's, and mixed doubles events was contested. ==Medal summary== ===Medal table=== ===Events=== {| |- |rowspan=2|Men's singles |rowspan=2| Masataka Morizono |rowspan=2| Yuya Oshima | Lee Sang-su |- | Liu Yi |- |rowspan=2|Women's singles |rowspan=2| Che Xiaoxi |rowspan=2| Jiang Yue | Bernadette Szőcs |- | Yang Ha-eun |- |rowspan=2|Men's doubles |rowspan=2| Chiang Hung-chieh Huang Sheng-sheng |rowspan=2| Masataka Morizono Yuya Oshima | Chen Xin Liu Yi |- | Jung Young-sik Kim Min-seok |- |rowspan=2|Women's doubles |rowspan=2| Che Xiaoxi Jiang Yue |rowspan=2| Cheng I-ching Lee I-chen | Jeon Ji-hee Yang Ha-eun |- | Eriko Kitaoka Yuki Shoji |- |rowspan=2|Mixed doubles |rowspan=2| Kim Min-seok Jeon Ji-hee |rowspan=2| Chiang Hung-chieh Chen Szu-yu || Chen Chien-an Cheng I-ching |- | Taras Merzlikin Yana Noskova |- |rowspan=2|Men's team |rowspan=2| Liu Yi Jiaxin Lai Lyu Xiang Fang Yinchi Chen Xin |rowspan=2| Asuka Machi Jin Ueda Masataka Morizono Yuya Oshima Masaki Yoshida | Chen Chien-an Huang Sheng-sheng Liao Cheng-ting Chiang Hung-chieh Yang Heng-wei |- | Benjamin Brossier Romain Lorentz Tristan Flore Quentin Robinot |- |rowspan=2|Women's team |rowspan=2| Che Xiaoxi Guo Yichen Jiang Yue Ma Yuofei Zheng Shichang |rowspan=2| Chen Szu-yu Cheng Hsien-tzu Cheng I-ching Lee I-Chen Lin Chia-hui | Eriko Kitaoka Misako Niwa Rei Yamamoto Rika Suzuki Yuki Shoja |- | Hwang Jina Jeon Ji-hee Lee Soo-bong Lee Yeongeun Yang Ha-eun |} ==References== ==External links== *2015 Summer Universiade – Table tennis 2015 Category:2015 in table tennis Category:2015 Summer Universiade events
title: Table tennis at the 2015 Summer Universiade
